name: JUSFASLEX
description:
13 years ago, a man named Joann decided he would bring God back into our world. He couldn't succeed, but his idea lives on through Theodore, an aloof dreamer who's trying to create a utopian society in a new world.

JUSFASLEX is a story about a boy's struggle to stay himself and get along with the new inhabitants of his dimension: Emma, a spirited redhead older than him, and Rebecca, a charming, reserved girl who likes being alone just like him.

Game features:
- Short kinetic story
- The atmosphere of a Victorian manor house
- Ukrainian voice acting
